attributes.review: This app tried to sell me fascist ideals. Every hour on the hour I would get a push notification that would spew nonsense, always ending with a quote from the bible. In short, you should totally download this app if you want almost 30 notifications a day, and to read the crap that Rapist Donald Trump came up with in his little pea sized orange colored brain.
